text: <@U03AKL6Q1B2>, I have noticed that if I change the theme, it automatically changes for other users. What happens if a user is building a landing page with a specific theme, and from my user I change the theme to make my landing page or website? In my organization there are many users and each area uses its own templates.

There can be multiple brand kits, each with their own theme as default, but unfortunately from the editor when you choose a different theme, it sets that for all users and each user has to switch back to the one they need to use for the next page they create
then it does not cause any conflict with other users, the only thing they have to do is change the theme.  thank you very much for answering me
Correct, it won't impact other pages, only future pages if not switched back
